nodes.documentation:
@notice Library to check finalization for MoreVP protocol
@dev This library assumes that the tx is of the GenericTransaction format
nodes.name: MoreVpFinalization

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (bytes memory) pure returns (struct GenericTransaction.Transaction memory)
literal_string "MoreVpFinalization: not a MoreVP protocol tx"

arguments.value: MoreVpFinalization: not a MoreVP protocol tx

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "MoreVpFinalization: not a MoreVP protocol tx"

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Failed to get the root hash of the block num"

arguments.value: Failed to get the root hash of the block num

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Failed to get the root hash of the block num"

nodes.documentation:
@notice Checks whether a transaction is "standard finalized".
        For MoreVP, it means the transaction should be included in a plasma block.
nodes.name: isStandardFinalized

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (bytes memory) pure returns (struct GenericTransaction.Transaction memory)
literal_string "MoreVpFinalization: not a MoreVP protocol tx"

arguments.value: MoreVpFinalization: not a MoreVP protocol tx

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "MoreVpFinalization: not a MoreVP protocol tx"

nodes.documentation:
@notice Checks whether a transaction is "protocol finalized"
        For MoreVP, since it allows in-flight tx, so only checks for the existence of the transaction
nodes.name: isProtocolFinalized
